components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to 9Mobile in Nigeria

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to 9Mobile in Nigeria. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue with Historical Reporting not available for Flex users of customers with enabled Flex Insights.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Flex Insights. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Onvoy in United States of America via Subset of Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays and failures to Onvoy in the United States of America via a subset of Shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Reports Delays to DigiTel C.A. in Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of) via Subset of Pre-Registered Sender ID.

incident_updates.body: We still continue to experience SMS delivery reports delays when sending messages to DigiTel C.A. in Venezuela via subset of pre-registered Sender ID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery reports delays when sending messages to DigiTel C.A. in Venezuela via subset of pre-registered Sender ID. The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 23 December 2024 at 12:00 PST until 23 December 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The MegaFon and Yota networks in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 December 2024 at 12:00 PST until 23 December 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon and Yota Russia handsets.

The MegaFon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 December 2024 at 12:00 PST until 24 December 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The MegaFon and Yota networks in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 December 2024 at 12:00 PST until 25 December 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon and Yota Russia handsets.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 25 December 2024 at 12:00 PST until 25 December 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 January 2025 at 22:00 PST until 07 January 2025 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets.

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 January 2025 at 00:00 PST until 07 January 2025 at 02:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from United States handsets via United States short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner EE United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 January 2025 at 13:50 PST until 08 January 2025 at 04:05 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 January 07:00 PST until 14 January 08:00 PST on the Twilio Interconnect backend service. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls, though it is not expected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - NTT Docomo

incident_updates.body: The NTT Docomo network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2025 at 08:00 PST until 15 January 2025 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from NTT Docomo Japan handsets.
